title: Resolve for a commission to review, replace, and eliminate the Grand Jury System

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Lewis (by request), a petition (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 1151) of Vincent Dixon,  that provisions be made for an investigation and study by a special commission to review, replace, and eliminate the Grand Jury System.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-02:30 PM in A-1                                                                                                                       and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time

Hearing rescheduled to 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1                                                                                                                        and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Accompanied a study order (under JR10), see S2886
